```{r}
# If not installed, please install these packages
install.packages("DBI")
install.packages("RSQLite")

install.packages("extrafont")
install.packages("RODBC")
install.packages("sqldf")
```


```{r}
# Set working directory
setwd("~/intro-to-programming/notebooks")
```


```{r}
# Create a connection to the database "exam_database.db" in our data folder 
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
library(tidyverse)

library(extrafont)
library(RODBC)
library(sqldf)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

filename <- "../data/exam_database.db"
my_connection <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(),
                           dbname = filename)
my_connection
```


```{r}
# Check what tables exist in exam_database
dbListTables(my_connection)
```
